articles.description: Spider-Man: No Way Home's reign atop the domestic box office has been extended to three weeks following the latest MCU film earning another $52.7 million over the last weekend of 2021.

articles.title: Rapper Kodak Black arrested on trespassing charges in South Florida - NBC News
articles.description: Rapper Kodak Black was arrested on New Year's Day in Broward County, Florida, and charged with trespassing, according to local reports.
